features: Portable Travel Mouthwash: Mint extract, jasmine extract, xylitol, and cetylpyridinium chloride for on-the-go oral care.
Gum Protection: Safeguard your gums while enjoying the refreshing that this mouthwash provides.
Mouth Refreshment: Say goodbye to bad breath and hello to a clean and fresh mouth with every use.
Tartar Cleaning: Remove stubborn tartar buildup and maintain a healthy smile with ease.
Easy-to-Use: Simply tear open the packet, pour it into your mouth, gargle for 60 seconds, and spit it out. No need to rinse!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Use these for my business for customers to enjoy in the bathroom, seem to be great because we slowly use them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient Mini Packs
reviews.reviewText: Convenient Mini PacksThese are YXMGC Travel Size Mouthwash Packets Individual Mini Mouthwash for Fresh Breath - Pack of 20.This travel mouthwash, which comes in a pack of individually wrapped strips, is a handy and portable oral hygiene solution for on-the-go. The unique quality of these strips is their alcohol-free formula, which guarantees a soft and non-drying experience for your lips. Its mild flavor is an added benefit, making it a more agreeable choice for people who like a milder flavor. You can carry them easily and conveniently thanks to their packaging, whether you're on the go or just need a quick refresh. It deserves 4.5⭐️Stars. Hope you find this review helpful. All things considered, these travel mouthwash strips are a useful addition to your packing list, guaranteeing oral hygiene and fresh breath without the hassle of bulky bottles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small & compact mouthwash packets, easy to open, pleasant minty flavor, perfect for travel/go bags.
reviews.reviewText: These are cool little mouthwash packets, and floss sticks, this kit includes 20 mouthwash packets, and 20 flosser sticks, I like that they are very portable these would be perfect for camping, traveling, or keeping some in a GO/emergency bag, or even carrying one around for when you may need fresh breath quickly.The mouthwash has a pleasant minty taste and since it doesn't contain alcohol there is no burning sensation, the packet is easy to open with a tear here slot, then just squeeze out the liquid, and swish around for 20 seconds, then spit and rinse, very easy to use, and each packet has a perfect pre-measured amount, so no guesswork involved, the ingredients also look nice and are easily readable, it does contain xylitol, so it should be also kept away from dogs.The floss sticks are average, the string is on the thicker side but also held up fine for flossing, the back can also be used as a toothpick.Overall I recommend, portable and compact, easy to use, freshens breath quickly, cleans well, my box has a 3-year exp date.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for on the go
reviews.reviewText: Love these mouthwash packets, perfect for in to go

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Natural and very good for on the go!
reviews.reviewText: I don't use mouthwash because of the reports that have come out about how alcohol-based mouthwashes are really bad for your oral health. I was, however, intrigued when I saw that these don't contain alcohol or anything harmful.In this box you get 20 packets of mouthwash and 20 floss sticks. The mouthwash packets, you just tear off the top of and pour them in your mouth. There is plenty of mouthwash for a good swish around but not too much where it overflows and drips down the sides of your face. The flavor is very minty and pleasant due to mint extract. The floss sticks have less surface space than the floss sticks I use at home, but it makes sense because these are designed to use when you're out and would be perfect to handle that piece of food caught in your teeth. And if the floss doesn't get it, the sticks have a pick on the end which will no doubt do the trick.The main thing I love about these is that you can toss them in your pocket or purse (the picks are indiviually wrapped) which makes it really easy to have on hand should you find yourself out somewhere with food in your teeth or a need for instant fresh breath.Great product and so appreciate that the mouthwash is more natural.The ingredients: Purified water, sorbitol, glycerin, hydrogenated castor oil, biological Lysozyme, honeysuckle extract, bletilla extract, mint extract, jasmine extract, essence, Xylitol, menthol, Potassium sorbate, Cetylpyridinium chloride, citic acid

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel or work mouthwash solution! Nice flavor also!
reviews.reviewText: Like the title says, these taste great, are small enough to toss into your purse or bag and work great.They have a nice refreshing mint flavor, not too strong and doesn't sting.Plus they come with free mini flossers :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Convenient to have in the car
reviews.reviewText: Individual packs are convenient to carry and easy to use when needed ... just enough for one rinse. The included dental is a bit on the smallish side and doesn't feel super sturdy but does the job in a pinch.Made from mint extract without alcohol or sugar but does contain xylitol which I am not too pleased about. The mint flavor is pleasant and does a good job of freshening my breath.It is nice to have this ready in the car for when you are eating out and want to clean/freshen up your breath right after your meal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for lunch boxes or to keep in your car
reviews.reviewText: I have always tried to keep a small bottle of mouthwash in my car, usually one of those trial sizes. These are perfect. Approx 10ml an a very nice refreshing taste. Leaves my mouth feeling fresh. I am now making sure I keep a couple in my lunch bag used for work. Non-Alcoholic is nice also,
